SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
InitGameManager, MidGameManager, SuspendedGameManager
public abstract class GameManager extends Object
The abstract class representing the game manager responsible for managing the game flow and interactions. Subclasses must implement specific game-related methods. This class provides methods for dragging tiles to the bookshelf, registering players, setting the next current player, and quitting the game. It also includes methods for registering listeners for various game events and verifying if all players except a specified player are disconnected. The GameManager requires a Controller instance to manage the game.
Since:
03/05/2023
Version:
6.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

      public abstract void dragTilesToBookShelf(ClientInterface view, List<Coordinate> chosenTiles, int chosenColumn)

      chosenTiles - the list of chosen tile coordinates.
      chosenColumn - the chosen column index.
